name: Hollow Knight: Silksong
summary: An incredibly charming and beautiful game let down by stupid troll-y difficulty.
pros: Improves over Hollow Knight in every way IMO
cons: I dislike the shell shard system. Just let me have fun? What’s the point of architect crest even.
Too difficult for a casual player like me
Enemies doing too much damage and health being so low doesn't make it all too fun
Stupid runbacks are bad game design IMO (looking at you, last judge)
